title: Madonna Confessions Title Font
content:
Anyone know of a font similar to this one?

Not so worried about the light bulb effect, doing that part in aftereffects, but just a similar script font with a nice thick stroke.

Exact not necessary, but the closer the better.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [madgeLightTitle.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140125043155/http:/typophile.com/files/madgeLightTitle.png) | 90.92 KB |
author: adamschoales

comments.content: Not a font. Compare the two a's and n's.
Fair enough, but is there something similar out there?

[FreshScript](http://web.archive.org/web/20140125043155/http:/www.fonts101.com/xt_fontdetails_az_FID!19724~FreshScript~font.html)  
or Mistral (you need to do something about the M).

@paulstonier: Silken has, btw, serious design and spacing problems with the germandbls (test: fleißig), but that seems to be quite frequent with Scholtz' fonts.

Andreas
